'''''Gymnopilus aromaticus''''' is a species of [[mushroom]] in the [[Cortinariaceae]] family. It was first described by American mycologist [[William Alphonso Murrill|Murrill]] in 1917.<ref>{{cite journal |author=Murrill WA. |year=1917 |title=''Gymnopilus'' |journal=North American Flora |volume=10 |pages= 193–215}}</ref>
